trans-unit.source: Did you want to leave without applying changes?
Set a custom name. To set the place of numbering use {number}
trans-unit.target: Set a custom name. To set the place of numbering use {number}

trans-unit.source: Right click on this text or on the arrow above to rename
trans-unit.target: Fai clic destro qui o sulla freccia accanto per rinominare

trans-unit.source: Add a new chapter and then start typing.
trans-unit.target: Aggiungi un nuovo capitolo e inizia a scrivere.

trans-unit.source: Add a new chapter and then start typing.
trans-unit.target: Aggiungi un nuovo capitolo e inizia a scrivere.

trans-unit.source: Hey! Slow down a little bit! Did you want to exit without saving your progress?
trans-unit.target: Hey! Slow down a little bit! Did you want to exit without saving your progress?

trans-unit.source: This file already exists! Change the name or location otherwise, the file is gonna be replaced.
trans-unit.target: Il file non esiste. Change the name or location otherwise, the file is gonna be replaced.

trans-unit.source: You did not finish the goal you set. Do you really want to quit?
trans-unit.target: Non hai completato l'obiettivo preimpostato. Sei sicuro di voler uscire?

trans-unit.source: After changing this setting, a restart is required for changes to fully apply.
trans-unit.target: Riavvio dell'app necessario per rendere effettive le modifiche.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred your file couldn't be load.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un errore. File non caricato.

trans-unit.source: If you are on the last chapter and Ctrl+Page down is pressed, should it automatically add a new chapter?
trans-unit.target: Consente di aggiungere un nuovo capitolo premendo Ctrl+Pag Giù.

trans-unit.source: It seems that there is new update in the store!
trans-unit.target: Sembra ci sia un nuovo aggiornamento sullo store!

trans-unit.source: You can easily add a new character by tapping on the "Add new character" button.
trans-unit.target: You can easily add a new character by tapping on the "Add new character" button.

trans-unit.source: There are no characters in this project.
trans-unit.target: There are no characters in this project.

trans-unit.source: You will have to leave Focus Mode before you can add a new one.
trans-unit.target: You will have to leave Focus Mode before you can add a new one.

trans-unit.source: There are no characters in this project.
trans-unit.target: There are no characters in this project.

trans-unit.source: "This character has short brown hair. Is smart and kind..."
trans-unit.target: "This character has short brown hair. Is smart and kind..."

trans-unit.source: The application remembers what project was last open and tries to load it on the next startup.
trans-unit.target: L'app si ricorderà l'ultimo progetto salvato e tenterà di riaprirlo all'appertura.

trans-unit.source: Rate and review on Microsoft Store
trans-unit.target: Valuta e recensisci sul Microsoft Store

trans-unit.source: Are you enjoying this app? Please consider leaving a review on Microsoft Store.
trans-unit.target: Are you enjoying this app? Please consider leaving a review on Microsoft Store.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred your file couldn't be saved.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un errore. Il file non può essere salvato.

trans-unit.source: This file already exists! Change the name or location otherwise, the file is gonna be replaced.
trans-unit.target: This file already exists! Change the name or location otherwise, the file is gonna be replaced.
